titleStmt.title: A true copie of a letter of speciall consequence from Rotetrdam [sic] in Holland subscribed by severall credible hands; and sent to a citizen of good note in London; being very considerable to be taken notice of by all the well-affected throughout the whole kingdom; but especially by the Citie of London.

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted for Henry Overton, and are to be sold at his shoppe in Popes-head Alley,
publicationStmt.date: MDCXLII. the 20. day of the second moneth. [1642, i.e. 1643]

notesStmt.note: Respecting arms and ammunition collected by Queen Henrietta Maria for shipment to England.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
